wikipedia_page.main:
Gaynor Louise Barnes (born 27 September 1961) is a British presenter and journalist who was employed by ITV Yorkshire.
Gaynor is a patron of Yorkshire Air Ambulance & The Prince of Wales Hospice in Pontefract.

response: * Gaynor Barnes, presenter since 1991 of ITV Yorkshire's Calendar

link_mentions.page: List of ITV journalists and newsreaders
response: * Gaynor Barnes – presenter and journalist employed by ITV Yorkshire since 1991

The regular presenters of the North edition were Duncan Wood and Christine Talbot; two other long-standing Calendar presenters, John Shires and Gaynor Barnes, became the main regular presenters of the South edition. Both editions of the programme were broadcast from ITV Yorkshire's Leeds studios.
